truegold_infantry_training.title: Truegold Infantry Training
truegold_infantry_training.desc: A modernized Truegold production line reduces Truegold Infantry training costs.

truegold_infantry_aid.title: Truegold Infantry Aid
truegold_infantry_aid.desc: Truegold has a powerful restorative effect on the human body, accelerating Truegold Infantry healing.

truegold_infantry_healing.title: Truegold Infantry Healing
truegold_infantry_healing.desc: Truegold has a restorative effect all its own, reducing healing costs on Truegold Infantry.

truegold_infantry.title: Truegold Infantry
truegold_infantry.desc: With a Truegold arsenal by your side, the Barracks can deploy even more powerful Infantry.

truegold_plating.title: Truegold Plating
truegold_plating.desc: Truegold armor is the most elite available, increasing Infantry Defense.

truegold_mauls.title: Truegold Mauls
truegold_mauls.desc: Superior quality and speed are synonymous on the field, improving Infantry Attack.

truegold_legionaries.title: Truegold Legionaries
truegold_legionaries.desc: Truegold enhances the command abilities of alliance heroes and increases the Rally Squad Capacity.

truegold_blades.title: Truegold Blades
truegold_blades.desc: Every aspect of refined Truegold weaponry increases Infantry Lethality.

truegold_shields.title: Truegold Shields
truegold_shields.desc: The command alloys of Truegold-forged shields increase Infantry Health.

truegold_battalion.title: Truegold Battalion
truegold_battalion.desc: Truegold enhances the command abilities of heroes and increases Squads’ Deployment Capacity.

truegold_archer_training.desc: A modernized Truegold production line reduces Truegold Archer training costs.

truegold_archer_healing.title: Truegold Archer Healing

truegold_archers.title: Truegold Archers
truegold_archers.desc: With a Truegold arsenal by your side, the Range can deploy even more powerful Archers.

truegold_vests.title: Truegold Vests
truegold_vests.desc: Truegold armor is the most elite available, increasing Archer Defense.

truegold_arrows.title: Truegold Arrows
truegold_arrows.desc: Truegold arrowheads are known for stability and piercing consistency, increasing Archer Attack.

truegold_legionaries_archer.title: Truegold Legionaries (Archer)
truegold_legionaries_archer.desc: Truegold enhances the command abilities of alliance heroes and increases the Rally Squad Capacity.

truegold_bracers.title: Truegold Bracers
truegold_bracers.desc: A Truegold bracer is the perfect accompaniment to a watchful bowman, increasing Archer Health.

truegold_bows.title: Truegold Bows
truegold_bows.desc: Every aspect of refined Truegold weaponry increases Archer Lethality.

truegold_battalion_archer.title: Truegold Battalion (Archer)
truegold_battalion_archer.desc: Truegold enhances the command abilities of heroes and increases Squads’ Deployment Capacity.

truegold_cavalry.title: Truegold Cavalry
truegold_cavalry.desc: With a Truegold arsenal by your side, the Stable can deploy even more powerful Cavalry.

truegold_platecraft.title: Truegold Platecraft
truegold_platecraft.desc: Truegold armor is the most elite available, increasing Cavalry Defense.

truegold_lances.title: Truegold Lances
truegold_lances.desc: The light and indestructible body of a Truegold lance gives Cavalry greater reach, increasing Cavalry Attack.

truegold_charge.desc: Every aspect of refined Truegold weaponry increases Cavalry Lethality.

truegold_farriery.desc: Truegold-forged horseshoes are far more durable, increasing Cavalry Health as a result.
